channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Andy the gasman's stew
item.description:
Andy the gasman's stew



Throw this meat stew with chunky veg and chickpeas together, cook it slowly and tweak it your way..

item.title: Gnocchi alla sorrentina
item.description:
Gnocchi alla sorrentina



Baked gnocchi with tomato and mozzarella.

item.title: Shrimp scampi
item.description:
Shrimp scampi



Fun Fact: Shrimp Scampi is an amalgamation of many different traditional Italian preparations of scampi (otherwise known as langoustines, Dublin Bay prawns, or Norway Lobsters). Therefore, there isn’t one correct way in which to make it. Try swapping out the pasta in our recipes for rice, or even just a loaf of crusty bread..

item.title: Riojan pork, chorizo and potato pot
item.description:
Riojan pork, chorizo and potato pot



This typically Spanish one pot is packed with flavour and can be made-ahead - perfect for relaxed entertaining or a family midweek meal served with crusty bread..

item.title: Pasta e fagioli
item.description:
Pasta e fagioli



Translating as ‘pasta and beans’ and inspired by the classic Italian soup, this is cold-weather comfort food at its best..
